item.title: CROPWAT Tutorial
item.description: CROPWAT Tutorial

item.title: CROPWAT Project
item.description: 01. CropWat CROPWAT is a decision support tool developed by the Land and Water Development Division of FAO. CROPWAT 8.0 for Windows is a computer program for the calculation of crop water requirements and irrigation requirements based on soil, climate and crop data. In addition, the program allows the development of irrigation schedules for different management conditions and the calculation of scheme water supply for varying crop patterns. CROPWAT 8.0 can also be used to evaluate farmers’ irrigation practices and to estimate crop performance under both rainfed and irrigated conditions.

item.title: MATLAB Tutorial (Persian)
item.description: This PDF files is prepared by Erfan Karimian from Najafabad branch of Islamic Azad University. Chapter 01 - Starting with MATLAB. Chapter 02 - Creating Arrays. Chapter 03 - Mathematical Operations with Arrays. Chapter 04 - Using Script Files and Managing Data. Chapter 05 - Two-Dimensional Plots. Chapter 06 - Programming in MATLAB. Chapter 07 - User-Defined Functions and Function Files. Chapter 08 - Polynomials, Curve Fitting, and Interpolation. Chapter 09 - Applications in Numerical Analysis.
